    • setQuestionIds

      public void setQuestionIds(List<Long> questionIds) throws Exception
      Set the question in the exam by their ids.
      Parameters:
      questionIds - List of question ids as listed in question database
      Throws:
      Exception - Input list is empty, question id duplicated in exam or not exist in question database

    • addQuestion

      public void addQuestion(Question question) throws Exception
      Add the question to the exam
      Parameters:
      question - Question for adding
      Throws:
      Exception - Question duplicated in exam or not exist in question database

    • addQuestionId

      public void addQuestionId(long id) throws Exception
      Add the question to the exam by their id
      Parameters:
      id - Id of question for adding
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id duplicated in exam or not exist in question database

    • searchQuestionIdInExam

      public int searchQuestionIdInExam(Long qId)
      Search for the index (question number) of a question in the exam according to its id. Return -1 if no corresponding question id
      Parameters:
      qId - Id of question for searching
      Returns:
      Index of question id

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(Question question) throws Exception
      Delete the given question in the exam
      Parameters:
      question - Question for deleting
      Throws:
      Exception - Question does not exist in the exam

    • deleteQuestionId

      public void deleteQuestionId(long id) throws Exception
      Delete the given question in the exam according to their ids
      Parameters:
      id - Question id for deleting
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id does not exist in the exam

    • setTime

      public void setTime(int time) throws Exception
      Set the exam time. It should be an integer within range (ExamDatabase.EXAM_TIME_LOWER_LIMIT, ExamDatabase.EXAM_TIME_UPPER_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      time - Exam time
      Throws:
      Exception - Exam time out of range

    • setTime

      public void setTime(String time) throws Exception
      Set the exam time. It should be an integer within range (ExamDatabase.EXAM_TIME_LOWER_LIMIT, ExamDatabase.EXAM_TIME_UPPER_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      time - Exam time in string format
      Throws:
      Exception - Exam time out of range or is not an integer

    • setName

      public void setName(String name) throws Exception
      Set the exam name. Length of name should be in range (0, ExamDatabase.EXAM_NAME_LENGTH_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      name - Exam time
      Throws:
      Exception - Exam name length out of range
